title: Mirror of Germany. No. 145 = Deutschland Spiegel

description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: German Gyro Wheel championships held in Frankfurt-on-Main; a new technical device makes aircraft largely independent of bad weather conditions; 16th Industries Exhibition; opening of a new publishing house; Gutenberg museum in Mainz; the work shop of Helmuth A.P. Grieshaber, Germany's leading contemporary wood carver; life in Schwabing in Munich's Leopoldstrasse, a miniature Montmartre; gymnasts compete for the world championships at the Westphalia Hall, Dortmund.
